summary: Romance blossoms between two rival families practicing Shaolin and Wudang kungfu respectively. despite familial opposition - until they overcome a gang of scheming bandits together.
cast: Jet Li|Lan Ding|Qiuyan Huang|Chunhua Ji|Qingfu Pan|Jiankui Sun|Chenghui Yu|Hai Yu|Jianqiang Hu
title: Boys Fighters
